content: CFS-T FB EX filler modules Filler modules for sealing unused space within transit frames in potentially explosive atmospheres ### Categories: Home > Products > Firestop & fire protection > Cable transit frames and penetration sealing systems- - ### FEATURES:Features Placeholder for future cable installations Filler modules are supplied as one perforated block and can be easily separated for individual use Applications For use in potentially explosive atmospheres Industries affected by the ATEX directive, such as the petrochemical and chemical industries Oil and gas platforms which are not covered by the IMO resolution For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Temperature resistance range: -40 - 167 °F Free from: Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) Technical Data | Temperature resistance range | -40 - 167 °F | Free from | Halogen (halogen content <= 0.1 weight %) ### ITEMS- 2042707 - Filler module CFS-T FB EX 24x5/0 - Package Size 36 pc - 2042708 - Filler module CFS-T FB EX 12x10/0 - Package Size 18 pc - 2042709 - Cable Transit Filler Module - Package Size 96 pc
